column4: I have a GeForce 6800, Intel P4 Prescott with 2 cores running @ 3.2 GHz, I've used Debian, Gentoo, and Ubuntu I use an infocus in76 with a DVI -> HDMI cable. I have tried all manner of nvidia drivers and I still get random freezes, most importantly in ubuntu I get random freezes when minimizing, I have tried disabling powernow tricks I've tried modifying xorg personally, I've switched back to metacity, I'm currently in XFCE4 and I
have just now updated to Gutsy proposed, and am still encountering random freezes which seem to be related to minimizing...
